alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western San Fernando Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 8:13PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong storm will impact portions of southeastern Ventura and west central Los Angeles Counties through 845 PM PDT... At 810 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong storm capable of producing a waterspout or landspout over Point Mugu, or 10 miles south of Camarillo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees, tree limbs, and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thousand Oaks...Simi Valley...Camarillo...Agoura Hills...Moorpark... Point Mugu State Park...Westlake Village...Newbury Park... Malibu Creek State Park...Naval Base Ventura County... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in OXNARD.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western San Fernando Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
